title: Jon Batiste Brings New Orleans Flair to Super Bowl National Anthem: Watch
description: The Louisiana native represented the city hosting the Super Bowl in signature style. Jon Batiste Brings New Orleans Flair to Super Bowl National Anthem: Watch Mary Siroky
author: Mary Siroky
excerpt: Seven-time Grammy winning artist Jon Batiste kicked off the Super Bowl with a soulful rendition of The National Anthem.

html:
Jon Batiste kicked off Super Bowl LIX¬†in classic fashion, bringing his jazz-inspired energy to the performance. Watch it below.

The stylish performance followed a rendition of ‚ÄúAmerica the Beautiful‚Äù delivered by New Orleans artist Trombone Shorty, with vocals from Lauren Daigle. Earlier in the evening, Lady Gaga also delivered a heartfelt performance of ‚ÄúHold My Hand‚Äù dedicated to the city of New Orleans.

Later this month, Jon Batiste is scheduled to appear at Montreaux Jazz Festival in Miami; grab tickets here.

As the game is underway, explore our list of the most interesting prop bets related to the Super Bowl.
